main event: An unidentified soundless object was observed to explode in the sky near Red Oak, Iowa on 17 Dec 55.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to red to blue during its descent,The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds,Various eyewitnesses, including a high school student and air traffic controllers, reported seeing the same object,Professional opinions suggested it was a meteorite based on its trajectory and characteristics,The object burned out in the horizon before disappearing from view.
witness description: A 15-year-old high school student and two air traffic controllers in Kansas City, Missouri.
